name: poke-flute
effect: Wakes up sleeping Pokémon. Required to wake up sleeping snorlax on the overworld.
short_effect: Use to awaken sleeping Pokémon, including Snorlax on roads.

flavor_text.sun_moon: A flute that can play with such a beautiful tone that even sleeping Pokémon find themselves roused.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: A flute that can play with such a beautiful tone that even sleeping Pokémon find themselves roused.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A flute that can play with such a beautiful tone that even sleeping Pokémon find themselves woken up.
